7_1LJMypJ67iEBwah82xwVVdB8SGZ1mwqgHQ.body: Sometimes has bugs, but usable. May become a standard for a non-paranoid yet rather anonimous and secure 1to1 communication along with zeronet for storage and distribution of information. For paranoid messaging bitmessage is a choice, of course.
